app.description: Help your customer support agents to view Zoho CRM data inside every ticket
app.name: Zoho CRM

authtoken.label: Auth Token
authtoken.helpText: To know how to get an Auth Token, please visit: https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-crm-for-zendesk.html

zohoeu.label: Are you using Zoho CRM EU?
zohoeu.helpText: Enable this checkbox if you are using the Europe datacenter of Zoho (crm.zoho.eu).

zohocrm_app.unable_to_fetch_data: Unable to fetch data from Zoho CRM. Please check whether you have entered the valid Authtoken of Zoho CRM or please contact us @ support@zohoextensions.com.
zohocrm_app.no_records_matched: No matching records found in Zoho CRM for this requestor email.
zohocrm_app.no_account_records_matched: No matching records found in Zoho CRM for this organization.
